description:
Being short on money, Kyo and Asu hunt for Big Sale items for dinner everyday. When trying to pick the last item of low-price white radish, Asu is outpaced by a blonde girl her age who happily presents her prey to her older sister.
Next day at school Asu runs into the blonde girl again. They both chase to the shop with the Big Sale but when they struggle for the last pork item the blonde Ginko fakes tears, claiming her older sister would scold her if she didn`t bring the pork home. Asu hesitates, then offers the pork to Ginko - who laughs at her for being that naive... right when some woman takes that last pork item away.

titles.title: A Day of Carrots, Lies, and the Echigoya Sisters
Ninjin to Uso to Echigoya Shimai no Hi
Um dia de cenouras, mentiras e as irmãs Echigoya
にんじんと嘘と越後屋姉妹の日
